title: Why the Maid Inherited the Duke’s Legacy - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Curses   Cute Children   Dishonest Protagonist   European Ambience   Family   Female Protagonist   Flashbacks   Handsome Male Lead   Maids   Misunderstandings   Mysterious Illness   Second Chance
author: Chanyeon   찬연
description:
The maid, Ivnia, who escaped in the night in the midst of a scandal has returned. With a young daughter who looks exactly like the owner of the mansion.


'The past has already been completely forgotten. Let me work as her maid again.'

'Did you just run away to do this? '

It was the man who told her to erase the child. She was nothing more than a toy. Ivnia bowed her head humiliatingly low without showing any emotion. All she had to do was find materials to cure her child's illness in this mansion. But why is he angry?

'Give that idiot a job. Or let her live in an abandoned detached house.'

'Someday you will find me crying again.'>
